name: James L. Jones, Jr.
office: 22 nd  United States National Security Advisor
commands: 3rd Battalion 9th Marines, 24th Marine Expeditionary Unit, 2nd Marine Division, Commandant of the Marine Corps, United States European Command &, Supreme Allied Commander, Europe
awards: Defense Distinguished Service Medal (3), Silver Star, Legion of Merit (5), Bronze Star, French Légion d'honneur, French Ordre national du Mérite, Canadian Meritorious Service Cross, NATO Meritorious Service Medal
